title: In My Shoes - Tamara Mellon Interviewed by Pattie Sellers I Fortune
excerpt: Tamara Mellon oversaw the massive growth of Jimmy Choo, exited in a whirlwind of controversy, and saw her own line of shoes and apparel go bust. Now the fashion entrepreneur has relaunched and rethought success, and sheâ€™s with us to talk about her path to resilience.
